{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06693v1", "title": "A characterization of complex stable phase retrieval in Banach lattices", "summary": "This note provides a characterization of the subspaces of a complex Banach
lattice which do stable phase retrieval, in the spirit of the characterization
of real stable phase retrieval established by D. Freeman, T. Oikhberg, B.
Pineau and M. A. Taylor.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-04-09T08:53:47Z"}
